Essay discussing in particular editorial cartoonists John T. McCutcheon, Robert Minor, Rollin Kirby, Jay N. Darling, Daniel R. Fitzpatrick, Bill Mauldin, Herbert L. Block, Pat Oliphant, Jules Feiffer, Paul Conrad, Jeff MacNelly, Tom Toles; and magazine cartoonists Charles Dana Gibson, John Held Jr., Rea Irving, Peter Arno, E. Sims Campbell, Virgil Partch, Robert Day, Chon Day, Charles Addams, Eldon Dedini, Jack Cole, and William Steig; and Art Young and Ollie Harrington.
